instructions:
Sauté garlic and onion in olive oil for about 3 minutes in an uncovered frying pan that has a tight lid. Add
cabbage and caraway seeds and toss to coat with olive oil. Cover and sweat down the cabbage over very low
heat for about 25 or 30 minutes. It should have some firmness, but not hard to chew. Remove from heat and
chill.

DRESSING
1 tbsp olive oil
2 tsp lemon juice
1 1/2 tsp vinegar
3/4 tsp Dijon mustard
2 slices fried bacon, crumbled *(optional)*

Mix well, pour over and toss cabbage. Keep salad cold until serving. Serves 2. 
*(Rev. 8/19/94)*
name: Cabbage Salad
